iti14:2.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekanivaranampi samanupassami yena nivaranena nivuta paja digharattam sandhavanti samsaranti yathayidam, bhikkhave, avijjanivaranam.
iti14:2.2: Avijjanivaranena hi, bhikkhave, nivuta paja digharattam sandhavanti samsaranti”ti.
iti14:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
